name: Cracks Boxes Daniela
description: This game is a CIGA 2020 entry game. The game tells the story of a fond memory of a little girl named Daniela fighting for the control of her mind with her inner shadow. Two players can play as the shadows of Daniela and Daniela and get as many frames as possible in the map within a three-minute time limit. Players can create cracks by attacking to make opponents fall. There will be a certain time buffer after each attack. The two rift attacks are superimposed together to form a trap. The player who enters the trap will directly die and resurrect after a period of time. Players can also fill the trap by collecting boxes and placing the boxes on the trap in order to avoid to fall and die. Collect at the same time The cartons you arrive have a certain probability of getting a photo frame.
